short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect links other explorers on supported chains to the much more fun Dora block explorer. Saved you a few clicks!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dora aims to be the most user-friendly multichain block explorer for everyone. 
Install this extension to redirect other explorers on Dora-supported chains to our explorer for a simpler, more seamless block explorer experience.
